message: Thank you Shin Shin for always being my pillar of support. Without you, I would not have enough strength to press on every single day
I know that you have been working hard lately. I am very proud of you.
To me, you have been the most wonderful person I could ever ask for. You make me feel the happiest I have ever been
Thank you for making me laugh so brightly
I will always support you in whatever you do. Eventhough I dont say it directly most of the time, just know that I will always be there for every step of your journey
From day one, I have always felt that you are so capable. I know that its not in your dictionary to give up on pursuing your goals but remember to take breaks when you are tired.
I believe in you alwaysssssssssss pyng shin heannnnnn

This should have been an occasion message but we dont have any upcoming occasions. SOOO.. I just wanted to compliment you for the effort you have put in to the MCS hari raya event. You did an amazinggggg job. It was a super duper awesome event. Your work put a smile on everybody's face that day. (13 April 2025)
Thank you baby for always choosing me and loving me everyday
JIAYOUUUUUU SHIN SHIN

Although we have our fair share of arguments, differences, and misunderstandings... You have always made me feel that I am enough. Even so, I hope you know that I am trying to be better, and I am still learning how I can support you better as a partner
Though I dont say it very often or even at all, I am grateful for you and I pray everyday for you to be safe and for good things to come your way
Thank you for always making sure that I go home safe and on time
I love you
I love you, thank you for making me feel so loved all the time
Thank you for holding my hand tight tight all the time
Thank you for always giving me warm hugs and never wanting to let go
You have always kept your word and promise with me. Thank you for not forgetting and always remembering
Baby babyyyy jiayou for workkkkk heheheh i love youuu
baby baby you can do itttttt
i believe in youuuuuuuuu
GOOD JOB SHIN SHINNNNNNN
Thank you for loving me everyday
Baby baby im so thankful to have met you i really feel so thankful because you really brought alot of change to my life
